summary: Our Hungarian company, IdM Solution grew to be a respected supplier of major international brands. In order to extend business possibilities I moved to The Netherlands where I co-founded Narabi Systems. We aim to provide quality enterprise software development services at an affordable price by involving our highly skilled Hungarian experts.
